UNDOMORPH_DESCRIPTION: Removes any Morph from a card or banner
INVALID_CODE: {{author}} The card code you provided is either invalid or not in your collection
NO_CHARACTER: {{author}} The character on this card is no longer available on Sofi and cannot be interacted with
NO_GIF: {{author}} You cannot remove cosmetics from a **GIF** card
NOT_MORPHED: {{author}} That card has no morph applied to it
UM_CONFIRMATION: Are you sure you want to remove this card's morph for **{{count}}** {{currencyEmoji}}?
NO_OWNER: {{author}} The card is no longer in your collection
SOMETHING_WENT_WRONG: {{author}} Something went wrong, please try again
NOT_ENOUGH_SILVERS: You don't have enough **{{currency}}** for this process
UNDOMORPH_EXTRA_INFO: Using this command on a card or banner will completely remove any Morph from it. This change cannot be reverted
